name: Space 'em Up
description:
Description

Space 'em Up is a shoot 'em up game prototype where you have to defeat incoming enemies. (How generic ik, haha).

Controls
  • Moving - WASD / Arrow keys
  • Shoot - Left Ctrl / Left Mouse Button
  • Alternate shoot type - Left Alt / Right mouse Button  

Currently reccomended to play only as windowed mode and in 800 x 600 resolution.

This project was made in about 48 hours as a college project study, and as a prototype, except  it's *incredibly buggy* side.  

Credits

Assets and other stuff used to help me out (THANKS A LOT GUYS!)

  • Blue Green And Red Spacecraft Asset, by Guardian;
  • Pixel Space Background Generator, by Deep-Fold;
  • Spaceship Shooter Enviroment, by ansimuz;
  • Free Lunar Battle Pack, by MattWalkden;
  • Player SpaceShip Sprite Sheet, by Carvel
Notes

New versions to polish and new features may come until it reaches a (not so bad) tech-demo.
